com.github.sworisbreathing.sfmf4j.api

Class DirectoryListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sworisbreathing.sfmf4j.api.DirectoryListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirectoryListener

    public class DirectoryListenerAdapter
extends Object
implements DirectoryListener
    No-op implementation of DirectoryListener. Developers are encouraged to extend this class and override its methods when they only need to implement a subset of the callbacks defined by the interface.
    Author:
    Steven Swor
